pageContext.claim: “Another totally Fake story in the Amazon Washington Post (lobbyist) which states that if my Aides broke the law to build the Wall (which is going up rapidly), I would give them a Pardon. This was made up by the Washington Post only in order to demean and disparage - FAKE NEWS!”
pageContext.analysis: It is telling that Trump's aides did not deny this account, and instead claimed the president was joking when he offered to pardon border officials who broke the law. The Washington Post does not lobby for Amazon.
